item.description:
A Party at the North End boutique Twilight

Join the Hello Stiletto Shoe Club for a night of mingling, shopping, complimentary wine & cheese, games and the pink carpet walk-off!

Twilight will offer a 15% discount for non-sale items.

About Twilight: Owner, Alison Barnard opened Twilight in 2007 following the success of her sister store, in-jean-ius. Inspired by the beautiful and the feminine, Twilight stocks styles that will take you from day to night for any type of occasion. Best known for our selection of party dresses, we also feature fabulous tops & knits, skirts, pants and jackets; not to mention a great selection of jewelry, stylish handbags, colorful pashminas/scarves, and every essential undergarment known to women.

Twilight offers top name designers, as well as new up and coming talent, which gives customers an opportunity to find pieces that are new and distinct.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside the store. If you have trouble finding us, please call 774 232 0000.
item.why: Join the ladies of the Hello Stiletto Shoe Club for a fun night of shopping, mingling and complimentary wine and cheese!
item.name: Ladies Night Party at Twilight, North End boutique
